summary: Newfoundland is a big island in the Canadian province of Newfoundland and Labrador. It's off the east coast of North America and is home to most of the province's people. The island is famous for being the easternmost point of the continent and for blocking the Saint Lawrence River to create a huge estuary. Many people who live there have British or Irish ancestors. The capital city is St. John's, and the total population is around 479,000.
title: Newfoundland (island)
